scripts.clean: cd frontend/app && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf dist && cd ../server && rm -rf node_modules && cd .. && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.init: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.build: npm run build.frontend && npm run build.server
scripts.predeploy: npm run init && npm run build
scripts.fb.login: firebase logout && firebase login && gcloud auth login && npm run fb.select-project
